00007 #include "Relay.h"
00008 
00009 #include "DigitalModule.h"
00010 #include "Resource.h"
00011 #include "Utility.h"
00012 
00013 // Allocate each direction separately.
00014 static Resource *relayChannels = NULL;
00015 
00022 void Relay::InitRelay (UINT32 slot)
00023 {
00024     Resource::CreateResourceObject(&relayChannels, tDIO::kNumSystems * kRelayChannels * 2);
00025     if (SensorBase::CheckRelayModule(slot) && SensorBase::CheckRelayChannel(m_channel))
00026     {
00027         if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kForwardOnly)
00028         {
00029             relayChannels->Allocate((DigitalModule::SlotToIndex(slot) * kRelayChannels + m_channel - 1) * 2);
00030         }
00031         if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kReverseOnly)
00032         {
00033             relayChannels->Allocate((DigitalModule::SlotToIndex(slot) * kRelayChannels + m_channel - 1) * 2 + 1);
00034         }
00035         m_module = DigitalModule::GetInstance(slot);
00036         m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, false);
00037         m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, false);
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00047 Relay::Relay(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel, Relay::Direction direction)
00048     : m_channel (channel)
00049     , m_direction (direction)
00050 {
00051     InitRelay(slot);
00052 }
00053 
00059 Relay::Relay(UINT32 channel, Relay::Direction direction)
00060     : m_channel (channel)
00061     , m_direction (direction)
00062 {
00063     InitRelay(GetDefaultDigitalModule());
00064 }
00065 
00070 Relay::~Relay()
00071 {
00072     m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, false);
00073     m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, false);
00074 
00075     if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kForwardOnly)
00076     {
00077         relayChannels->Free((DigitalModule::SlotToIndex(m_module->GetSlot()) * kRelayChannels + m_channel - 1) * 2);
00078     }
00079     if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kReverseOnly)
00080     {
00081         relayChannels->Free((DigitalModule::SlotToIndex(m_module->GetSlot()) * kRelayChannels + m_channel - 1) * 2 + 1);
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00099 void Relay::Set(Relay::Value value)
00100 {
00101     switch (value)
00102     {
00103     case kOff:
00104         if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kForwardOnly)
00105         {
00106             m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, false);
00107         }
00108         if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kReverseOnly)
00109         {
00110             m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, false);
00111         }
00112         break;
00113     case kOn:
00114         wpi_assert(m_direction != kBothDirections);
00115         if (m_direction == kForwardOnly)
00116         {
00117             m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, true);
00118         }
00119         else if (m_direction == kReverseOnly)
00120         {
00121             m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, true);
00122         }
00123         break;
00124     case kForward:
00125         wpi_assert(m_direction != kReverseOnly);
00126         if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kForwardOnly)
00127         {
00128             m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, true);
00129         }
00130         if (m_direction == kBothDirections)
00131         {
00132             m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, false);
00133         }
00134         break;
00135     case kReverse:
00136         wpi_assert(m_direction != kForwardOnly);
00137         if (m_direction == kBothDirections)
00138         {
00139             m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, false);
00140         }
00141         if (m_direction == kBothDirections || m_direction == kReverseOnly)
00142         {
00143             m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, true);
00144         }
00145         break;
00146     default:
00147         wpi_assert(false);
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 
00162 void Relay::SetDirection(Relay::Direction direction){
00163     if(m_direction == direction)
00164         return;
00165     m_module->SetRelayForward(m_channel, false);
00166     m_module->SetRelayReverse(m_channel, false);
00167     switch(direction)
00168     {
00169     case kBothDirections:
00170         m_direction = kBothDirections;
00171         break;
00172     case kForwardOnly:
00173         m_direction = kForwardOnly;
00174         break;
00175     case kReverseOnly:
00176         m_direction = kReverseOnly;
00177         break;
00178     default:
00179         wpi_assert(false);
00180     }
00181 }
